timeline.message:
Implement Deferred<T> lint check.

The check ensures that methods marked with `@DeferredApi` are only used
in the context of `Deferred#whenAvailable(DeferredHandler)` callback.

timeline.bodyText: nit: out of personal style, maybe using hasDeferredAnnotation could be a bit more readable.
